text:
Of course we use Junit. We are already using Junit in a lot of places. Have a
look at e.g. src/test/org/apache/lenya/cms/publication/* to see how a lot of the
publication specific classes are tested.

Similar tests could be written for the classes mentioned in the bug report.

Would you like to produce a patch?
